description: A legendary warrior from Natlan, Mualani wields a mighty claymore and commands the power of Hydro to overwhelm her foes. (Speculative/Community Build)
info: Mualani is a speculative Hydro claymore DPS from Natlan. Build her for CRIT, ATK%, and Hydro DMG Bonus. (Community/Placeholder)

skills.name: Normal Attack: Tidal Cleave
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes imbued with Hydro.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes imbued with Hydro.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous slashes. At the end, performs a more powerful Hydro slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE Hydro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Wavebreaker Strike
skills.desc: Mualani swings her claymore, sending forth a wave that deals Hydro DMG and reduces enemy resistance to Hydro.
skills.details_html:
Wavebreaker Strike
Sends forth a wave that deals Hydro DMG and reduces enemy Hydro RES.

skills.name: Ocean's Wrath
skills.desc: Mualani summons a tidal wave, dealing massive AoE Hydro DMG and increasing her own ATK for a short duration.
skills.details_html:
Ocean's Wrath
Summons a tidal wave, dealing massive AoE Hydro DMG and increasing Mualani's ATK for a short duration.

passive_talents.name: Tide's Blessing
passive_talents.desc: After using Wavebreaker Strike, Mualani's Hydro DMG is increased by 15% for 10s. (Placeholder)

passive_talents.name: Endless Current
passive_talents.desc: Ocean's Wrath increases all party members' ATK by 10% for 10s. (Placeholder)

passive_talents.name: Natlan's Swimmer
passive_talents.desc: Decreases swimming stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%. (Placeholder)

constellations.name: Breaker of Waves
constellations.desc: Wavebreaker Strike grants a shield that absorbs damage equal to 10% of Mualani's Max HP for 6s. (Placeholder)

constellations.name: Tidal Momentum
constellations.desc: Ocean's Wrath increases Hydro DMG Bonus by 15% for 10s. (Placeholder)

constellations.name: Flood's Edge
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Wavebreaker Strike by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15. (Placeholder)

constellations.name: Abyssal Surge
constellations.desc: When Mualani's HP falls below 50%, her ATK is increased by 20% for 10s. (Placeholder)

constellations.name: Queen of the Tides
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Ocean's Wrath by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15. (Placeholder)

constellations.name: Tide Unleashed
constellations.desc: After using Ocean's Wrath, Mualani's Normal Attacks deal an additional 30% Hydro DMG for 10s. (Placeholder)
